title.narrative: COMMUNICATION AND ADVOCACY FOR PROGRAMME RESULTS

description.narrative: Communication and advocacy for programme, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

participating-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH OF KYZYLORDA O
SPC FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF SOCIAL REHABILITATION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Communication and advocacy for programme

description.narrative: in 2021, the Communication team provided the necessary high quality communication, capacity building and visibility support to activities for all programmatic outcomes. Protection of UNICEF’s brand value was assisted through regular cooperation with outcome and output leads and direct engagement with their implementing partners. Sixteen human interest stories were produced to showcase programmatic results and win public support through compelling stories of;programme;beneficiaries.;A special media training for UNICEF spokespeople (outcome and output leads and cross-sectorial officers) was organized with external trainers to build their capacity and diversify the voice of UNICEF in the Kazakhstani media.;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2022
